name: df-isomgr
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4
body: |- wceq(cisomgr, copab(s0, s1, wex(s2, wa(wf1o(cv(s2), cfv(cvtx, cv(s0)), cfv(cvtx, cv(s1))), wex(s3, wa(wf1o(cv(s3), cdm(cfv(ciedg, cv(s0))), cdm(cfv(ciedg, cv(s1)))), wral(s4, cdm(cfv(ciedg, cv(s0))), wceq(cima(cv(s2), cfv(cfv(ciedg, cv(s0)), cv(s4))), cfv(cfv(ciedg, cv(s1)), cfv(cv(s3), cv(s4)))))))))))
comment: Define the isomorphy relation for graphs. (Contributed by AV, 11-Nov-2022.)
